synth.name: synth
synth.summery: autonomous minds housed in robotic shells, each distinguished by their unique blend of personality traits, strengths, and vulnerabilities
synth.appearance: reptilian head, equipped with a mechanical mouth, a visor displaying digital eyes, air-intake nostrils, ornamental horns, and LEDs to indicate status, all atop a form that can range from bipedal to serpentine
culture: in the perception of organics, synths, adorned solely in their functional modules, may present an appearance akin to nudity, despite being fully 'clothed' in their own technological context
